name: Egypt Home Story -Stone Design
description:
In the ancient times, the world is desolate. Prophets from all over the world summoned the Egypt Home Story, users will play Egypt Home Story and recreate the civilized world.
◇ The game is novel, fun and attractive.
◇ It contains many ancient civilizations such as the America, China, Egypt, etc.
◇ Deceleration, avatar, gold coin rain... and a variety of props to enrich the game.
◇ Obstacles such as lightning that appears randomly during the game will make the game funnier.
◇ Game Center's leaderboards can motivate users to pursue the higher score.
